Flow.label: Adoption - Start Adoption Process

fields.name: Adoption_Record_Created_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: An adoption record has been created for {!recordId.Animal_Name__c} with {!contactFullName}. The adoption process can now start.

fields.name: Animal_Type_Mismatch_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
The animal type of {!Get_Adopter_Profile_Record_for_Contact.Type_of_Animal__c} on the Adopter Profile for {!contactFullName} does not match the animal selected for adoption.


Please check the details, this wizard will end

fields.name: AutoMatchEnabledScreenText
fields.fieldText:
Contacts that Match

Either auto match is enabled or manual matches have been created. Therefore please select the Contact from the list below to start the adoption process.

fields.name: FlowErrorScreenText
fields.fieldText:
There has been an error in this flow. Please contact your Systems Administrator and quote:


Error: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: No_Adopter_Profile_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
{!contactFullName} does not have an active Adopter Profile.


Do you want to create an adopter profile record that can be used in the future?

fields.name: No_Adopter_Profile_Screen_Text1
fields.fieldText: NOTE: Adopter Profile record may need to go through a separate approval process

fields.name: Not_Available_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: {!recordId.Animal_Name__c} is not available for adoption. Check/update the animal's status and try again

fields.name: Start_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
You are going to create start the adoption process for {!recordId.Animal_Name__c}.


Choose the Contact who is adopting the animal
